about_the_game:
Fill your adventurer’s party with unique designs and revive your epic teen RPG ideas with the RPG HERO Team Pack! Gee-kun-soft’s latest MZ-style character pack offers up 16 characters with fantasy classes so your dungeon-diving heroes can make sure they have the best team for the quest. Give your players choices in their female and male party member’s classes thanks to 8 class options. Have your armored stoic hero, katana-wielding heroine, and shark-toothed warriors keep their party safe while the assassins in dark outfits sneak around to hit weak points, buff fighters attack head-on, and lightly armored samurai slice foes in half.

Each character comes with a walking character sprite, faceset with 8 emotions, a SV Battler, static enemy images, and bust images so you can build full storyline arcs and cutscenes for each hero in your game! This pack also includes 7 SV weapons so you can match a party member’s attack to the weapons that appear in their bust images, or give your main character some cool new swords and staves to wield. If you’ve been needing some extra characters to fill out your roster and want heroes with designs that highlight their classes, check out the RPG HERO Team Pack!

Contents:

* 16 characters
* walking sprites, facesets with 8 emotions, SV battlers, static enemy images and bust images
* 7 SV weapons

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
